casebody.data:
2002-1980 (La. 10/25/02)

Brent L. MORGAN, Jr. v. LAFOURCHE RECREATION DISTRICT NO. 5 and Lafourche Parish Through the Lafourche Parish Council. No. 2002-C-1980. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re American Tennis courts Inc.;— Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiora-ri and/or Review, Parish of Lafourche, 17th Judicial District Court Div. B, No. 85,208; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 CA 1191.

Denied.
